TopicTitle: Could you guys help me get to Duna ? Streaming so you can help me interactively

Articles.Content:
There are tons of tutorials here and on youtube about getting to Duna. Take some time and go through them and I'm sure you'll get there. In the six hours you have been waiting for someone to handwalk you through it - you could have been there and back again.

Good luck!
The Stream says you're trying to get to Eve, but this thread says Duna... And now I guess you're playing Prison Architect?
